trans-unit.source: Provides a page adapter for the cHTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un adattatore di pagina per il set di adattatori cHTML.

trans-unit.source: Adapters are usually constructed automatically by ASP.NET and must have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: Le schede sono in genere create automaticamente da ASP.NET e devono avere un costruttore predefinito.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: Crea e restituisce un writer di testo appropriato per gli adattatori specificati.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"></xref> object that contains request information, such as HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"> </xref> oggetto che contiene informazioni sulla richiesta, ad esempio le intestazioni HTTP.

trans-unit.source: Source identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore di origine per l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Argument identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore dell'argomento dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Collection of postback data from the request object.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di dati di postback dall'oggetto request.

trans-unit.source: A modified version of the baseCollection parameter.
trans-unit.target: Una versione modificata del baseCollection parametro.

trans-unit.source: Evaluates whether the device adapter set applies to the specified request.
trans-unit.target: Valuta se il set di adattatori di dispositivo si applica alla richiesta specificata.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Questa API è obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: |Class|Returns|Preferred rendering type|Check value of JavaScript property| |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> returns `true`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The device capability of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> returns `false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>.|N/A|
trans-unit.target: | Classe | Restituisce | Tipo di rendering preferito | Controllare valore della proprietà JavaScript | |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>| `true`| Controlla se il valore di <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>è <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>o <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>. | Restituisce il <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> `true`. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>| `true`| Controlla se il <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>o <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>. | Restituisce la funzionalità di dispositivo del <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> `false`. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>| `true`| Controlla se il <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11>o <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>. | N/A|</xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The current request context.
trans-unit.target: Il contesto della richiesta corrente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the device adapter set applies to the specified request; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il set di si applica alla richiesta specificata. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Renders the header associated with postbacks.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il rendering dell'intestazione associata ai postback.

trans-unit.source: For browsers that support script, this includes a script block to perform postback.
trans-unit.target: Per i browser che supportano script, include un blocco di script per eseguire il postback.
